languages.text: "Я так не считаю". {n}Соломон резко разворачивается к губернатору.{/n} "Сводки, которые я получал о Райкаде Минорис, свидетельствовали об устойчивом положении дел на мире. Либо порядок был подорван заговором сил Архиврага, либо ваша власть, губернатор, оказалась под угрозой из-за наплыва сумасшедших. В ваших интересах прислушаться к Вольному Торговцу".

"No." {n}Solomorne turns sharply to face the governor.{/n} "The reports I received on Rykad Minoris indicated that the situation on the planet was stable. Either this stability has been upset by a conspiracy of the Archenemy's forces, or it merely took a congregation of madmen to threaten your authority, Governor. It is in your best interests to listen to what the Rogue Trader is saying."
languages.original_text: "Я так не считаю". {n}Соломон резко разворачивается к губернатору.{/n} "Сводки, которые я получал о Райкаде Минорис, свидетельствовали об устойчивом положении дел на мире. languages.text: "Nein." {n}Idira wendet sich abrupt zum Gouverneur um.{/n} "Den Berichten zufolge, die ich auf Rykad Minoris erhielt, war die Situation auf dem Planeten stabil. Diese Stabilität wurde entweder durch eine Verschwörung von Kräften des Erzfeindes gestört, oder es bedurfte lediglich einiger Wahnsinniger, um Eure Autorität infrage zu stellen, Gouverneur. Es ist also in Eurem besten Interesse, Euch anzuhören, was {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sagt."
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Solomorne turns sharply to face the governor.{/n} "The reports I received on Rykad Minoris indicated that the situation on the planet was stable. Either this stability has been upset by a conspiracy of the Archenemy's forces, or it merely took a congregation of madmen to threaten your authority, Governor. It is in your best interests to listen to what the Rogue Trader is saying."

traits.locale_text: "Nein." {n}Idira wendet sich abrupt zum Gouverneur um.{/n} "Den Berichten zufolge, die ich auf Rykad Minoris erhielt, war die Situation auf dem Planeten stabil. Diese Stabilität wurde entweder durch eine Verschwörung von Kräften des Erzfeindes gestört, oder es bedurfte lediglich einiger Wahnsinniger, um Eure Autorität infrage zu stellen, Gouverneur. Es ist also in Eurem besten Interesse, Euch anzuhören, was {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sagt."

languages.text: « Non. {n}Solomorne se tourne brusquement vers le gouverneur.{/n} Les rapports qui me sont parvenus au sujet de Rykad Minoris faisaient état d'une situation planétaire stable. Soit cette stabilité a été mise à mal par une conspiration des forces du Grand Ennemi, soit il a juste suffi d'une congrégation de fous pour menacer votre autorité, gouverneur. Il est dans votre intérêt d'écouter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Solomorne turns sharply to face the governor.{/n} "The reports I received on Rykad Minoris indicated that the situation on the planet was stable. Either this stability has been upset by a conspiracy of the Archenemy's forces, or it merely took a congregation of madmen to threaten your authority, Governor. It is in your best interests to listen to what the Rogue Trader is saying."

traits.locale_text: « Non. {n}Solomorne se tourne brusquement vers le gouverneur.{/n} Les rapports qui me sont parvenus au sujet de Rykad Minoris faisaient état d'une situation planétaire stable. Soit cette stabilité a été mise à mal par une conspiration des forces du Grand Ennemi, soit il a juste suffi d'une congrégation de fous pour menacer votre autorité, gouverneur. Il est dans votre intérêt d'écouter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: «No». {n}Solomorne se gira bruscamente para mirar al gobernador.{/n} «Los informes que recibí sobre Rykad Minoris sugerían que la situación en el planeta era estable. O bien dicha estabilidad se ha visto alterada por una conspiración de las fuerzas del Archienemigo, o ha bastado un simple hatajo de dementes para socavar su autoridad, gobernador. Le convendría prestar atención a las palabras {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Solomorne turns sharply to face the governor.{/n} "The reports I received on Rykad Minoris indicated that the situation on the planet was stable. Either this stability has been upset by a conspiracy of the Archenemy's forces, or it merely took a congregation of madmen to threaten your authority, Governor. It is in your best interests to listen to what the Rogue Trader is saying."

traits.locale_text: «No». {n}Solomorne se gira bruscamente para mirar al gobernador.{/n} «Los informes que recibí sobre Rykad Minoris sugerían que la situación en el planeta era estable. O bien dicha estabilidad se ha visto alterada por una conspiración de las fuerzas del Archienemigo, o ha bastado un simple hatajo de dementes para socavar su autoridad, gobernador. Le convendría prestar atención a las palabras {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: “绝非如此。”{n}索罗蒙猛地转过头，盯着总督。{/n}“根据我得到的情报，小莱卡德原本局势非常稳定。所以说，要么是混沌大敌的阴谋酿成了这场暴乱，要么仅仅是一群微不足道的疯子，就足以威胁你的统治，总督。你最好听听行商浪人的看法，这是为了你好。”
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Solomorne turns sharply to face the governor.{/n} "The reports I received on Rykad Minoris indicated that the situation on the planet was stable. Either this stability has been upset by a conspiracy of the Archenemy's forces, or it merely took a congregation of madmen to threaten your authority, Governor. It is in your best interests to listen to what the Rogue Trader is saying."

traits.locale_text: “绝非如此。”{n}索罗蒙猛地转过头，盯着总督。{/n}“根据我得到的情报，小莱卡德原本局势非常稳定。所以说，要么是混沌大敌的阴谋酿成了这场暴乱，要么仅仅是一群微不足道的疯子，就足以威胁你的统治，总督。你最好听听行商浪人的看法，这是为了你好。”

languages.text: 「いいえ」{n}ソロモーンは急に振り向いて、総督を見据えた。{/n}「ライカド・ミノリスで受けた報告によると、惑星の状況は安定していたとのことでした。この安定は渾沌の勢力の陰謀で破られたのでしょうか。それとも狂人たちが総督の権威を脅かすだけの力を持っていただけなのでしょうか。ローグトレーダーの言葉に従うのが、あなたにとって最善です」
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Solomorne turns sharply to face the governor.{/n} "The reports I received on Rykad Minoris indicated that the situation on the planet was stable. Either this stability has been upset by a conspiracy of the Archenemy's forces, or it merely took a congregation of madmen to threaten your authority, Governor. It is in your best interests to listen to what the Rogue Trader is saying."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ」{n}ソロモーンは急に振り向いて、総督を見据えた。{/n}「ライカド・ミノリスで受けた報告によると、惑星の状況は安定していたとのことでした。この安定は渾沌の勢力の陰謀で破られたのでしょうか。それとも狂人たちが総督の権威を脅かすだけの力を持っていただけなのでしょうか。ローグトレーダーの言葉に従うのが、あなたにとって最善です」

languages.text: "Hayır." {n}Solomorne, sert bir şekilde valiye dönüyor.{/n} "Rykad Minoris'te edindiğim raporlara göre gezegenin durumu vaktinde istikrarlı seyrediyormuş. Bu istikrar ya Şerbaşı'nın güçlerinin bir komplosu sonucu tarumara uğratılmış ya da yalnızca aklını kaçırmış bir grup deli, otoritenizi tehdit etmeye çalışıyor Vali Bey. Hür Tacir'i dinlemeniz çıkarınıza olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "No." {n}Solomorne turns sharply to face the governor.{/n} "The reports I received on Rykad Minoris indicated that the situation on the planet was stable. Either this stability has been upset by a conspiracy of the Archenemy's forces, or it merely took a congregation of madmen to threaten your authority, Governor. It is in your best interests to listen to what the Rogue Trader is saying."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır." {n}Solomorne, sert bir şekilde valiye dönüyor.{/n} "Rykad Minoris'te edindiğim raporlara göre gezegenin durumu vaktinde istikrarlı seyrediyormuş. Bu istikrar ya Şerbaşı'nın güçlerinin bir komplosu sonucu tarumara uğratılmış ya da yalnızca aklını kaçırmış bir grup deli, otoritenizi tehdit etmeye çalışıyor Vali Bey. Hür Tacir'i dinlemeniz çıkarınıza olacaktır."
